questions: Is there an image of a character whose aura is being graded? Answer with yes or no.
Is the image cropped to the size of a real card? Answer with yes or no.
Does the label at the top have the title 'GNRLYXYZ'? Answer with yes or no.
Is '1/1' displayed directly below 'GNRLYXYZ' on the label? Answer with yes or no.
Is there a barcode placed beneath the '1/1'? Answer with yes or no.
Is the grade label displayed on the right side of the label at the top? Answer with yes or no.
Is the numeric grade from the scale displayed below the grade label? Answer with yes or no.
Is the certification number displayed below the numeric grade? Answer with yes or no.
Is all text on the label uniform in size? Answer with yes or no.
Is there balanced padding from the border for all text on the label? Answer with yes or no.
Is the display placed on a white background? Answer with yes or no.
Is the full display shown without any text or labels on the card? Answer with yes or no.
model_output:
yes There is a character depicted, possibly with elements suggesting an aura, but it's not explicitly labeled as such.
no The image does not appear to be cropped to the size of a real card; it looks to be digitally rendered and styled as a collectible game card.
yes The label at the top indeed has the title 'GNRLYXYZ'.
yes '1/1' is displayed directly below 'GNRLYXYZ' on the label, indicating its uniqueness.
no There is no barcode placed beneath the '1/1'; instead, other text is present.
no The grade label is not displayed on the right side of the label at the top; there's a diamond-shaped symbol instead.
no There is no numeric grade or grade label visible in this image.
no There is no certification number displayed below a numeric grade as there is no numeric grade present.
no The text on the label varies in size, with '1/1' and 'GNRLYXYZ' being different in font size and style.
no The padding from the border varies; some text like '1/1' has more space around it compared to the border than other elements.
yes The display is placed on a white background, indicating a clear, isolated presentation.
no The full display includes text and labels; it is not shown without any text.
